K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-0: @226a zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes snges bsgyur te gtan la phab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-2: a'arya aa pa ri mi ta a'a yurdzny'a na n'a ma ma h'a ya na s'u tra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-4: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-8: bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-12: steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226a-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-0: tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin @226b par bzhes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-1: sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-4: tshe thung ba las tshe lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-5: de dag las kyang phal cher dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-7: sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-9: ming tsam yang nyan tam; klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang bar byed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-13: phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-15: sems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:226b-16: sems can gang dag tshe zad kar mtshan 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:227a-0: rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa de dag de bzhin @227a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:227a-1: gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:227a-3: yi ger 'brir 'jug na de dag gi yon tan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:227a-6: aom na mo bha ga wa te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:227a-7: aa pa ri mi t'a a'a yurdzny'a na su bi ni shtsi ta te dzo r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:227a-8: ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha te samyaksam buddh'a ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:227a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig yi ger 'bri'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-038:227a-15: klog par gyur pa de'i tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te /
